casebody.data:
In re Carrie B.* (9455)

Dupont, C. J., Norcott and Lavery, Js.

Argued April 24 decision released April 24, 1991 Lawrence A. Dubin, for the appellant (respondent). Linda Pearce Prestley, assistant attorney general, with whom, on the brief, were Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, and Susan T. Pearlman, assistant attorney general, for the appellee (state). Mark Edwards, for the minor child.

In accordance with the spirit and intent of General Statutes § 46b-142 (b) and Practice Book § 2026, the names of the parties involved in this appeal are not disclosed. The records and papers of this case shall be open for inspection only to persons having a proper interest therein and upon order of the Appellate Court.

 Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
